thread.title: How Trump Could Declare a Trade Emergency
thread.title_full: How Trump Could Declare a Trade Emergency - POLITICO Magazine

author: politico.com
title: How Trump Could Declare a Trade Emergency
text: Could Donald Trumpâ€™s trade plans survive court attack? The president-elect is pledging an overhaul of trade policy that appears to break with longstanding American tradition. From threatening to withdraw from the 164-member World Trade Organization , to slapping tariffs on individual companies that offshore jobs, to this week appointing a trade critic as U.S. trade representative, Trump seems determined to reverse a decades-old bipartisan elite consensus.
